segments.text: I see the woman’s knee-length dress swaying slightly as she moves while drying the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s something so domestic about this scene, yet it feels oddly tense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her foot submerged in the puddle without a single glance down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel a bit disgusted, knowing she’s likely creating more work for herself later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's reaching into the cookie jar is both charming and reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m surprised that no one has called him out; it’s like they’re all in on a secret that shouldn’t exist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to hang on every move he makes, completely absorbed in his antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s a kind of joy in their mischief, even if it sends shivers down my spine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think if that stool tips, everything will change in an instant, and it terrifies me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm outside contrasts sharply with the tumultuous atmosphere building within.
segments.speaker: PAR
